Premium theme

item.title: Call to Action
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1449251905472{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_cta_button2 title="Go to Page →" position="right" link="url:%23||"]

Maecenas bibendum dictum libero.

Suspendisse dictum convallis est. Nunc sit amet dictum purus. Pellentesque nec dui neque. Duis eleifend eros et sem viverra fermentum. item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_position="center top" inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474713571901{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-image: url(http://demo.loprd.pl/creativa/wp-content/uploads/placehold.it/placehold.it-1920x1280.gif?id=2483) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" bg_overlay_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.95)" bg_overlay_color_2="#ffffff"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/6" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-offset-1"][vc_column_text]
Creativa — Features Index

Creativa — a modern, fully responsive multi-purpose WordPress Theme.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="100"][vc_single_image image="2810" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1474974639009{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="100"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1445278178299{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="2/3" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-md-offset-2"][vc_column_text]

It includes amazing features, is easy to use and build with modern tools and plenty of options which allows you to create fantastic websites in minutes, literally.

[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator el_width="small"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][loprd_iconbox icon="linecons" iconbox_title="Modern and Trendy Design" iconbox_title_style="inline" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-pen"]Design based on latest trends, with stunning attention to user experience and the best usability.[/loprd_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][loprd_iconbox icon="linecons" iconbox_title="Fully Responsive" iconbox_title_style="inline" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-phone"]Theme is 100% percent resposive, which means it looks amazing on every mobile devices. It also includes two fantastic mobile navigation layouts.[/loprd_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][loprd_iconbox icon="linecons" iconbox_title="Retina Ready" iconbox_title_style="inline" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-eye"]Ready for high resolution devices and screens. Takes your website to next level.[/loprd_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474713608049{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.03) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-md-offset-2"][vc_column_text]

Right solution for any kind websites.

Suited for all kind websites – corporate, product, shop, agency, portfolio, photography, blog and many more…

[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator el_width="small" css=".vc_custom_1445254932894{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_row_inner el_class="centered-content"][vc_column_inner][vc_button2 title="Corporate" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="Creative" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fhome%2Fhome-creative%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="Agency" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fhome%2Fhome-agency%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="Shop" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fhome%2Fhome-shop%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="Landing Page" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fhome%2Fhome-landing-page%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="One Page" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fhome%2Fhome-one-page%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="Blog" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fhome%2Fhome-blog%2F||"][vc_button2 title="and many more..." color="btn-light"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474714157904{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-md-offset-2"][vc_column_text]

Layout versatile in every aspect.

With Creativa there is no limits. Side, Wide, Boxed or Bordered layout - each with plenty of options - that is versatility.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width_content="full-width" css=".vc_custom_1445257011869{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;}"][vc_column width="7/12" css=".vc_custom_1445256940751{padding-right: 1% !important;padding-left: 2% !important;}"][vc_single_image image="2794" el_class="img-shadow" css=".vc_custom_1474908710076{margin-bottom: 20px !important;margin-left: -40px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1445268484538{padding-right: 1% !important;padding-left: 1% !important;}"][vc_single_image image="2793" el_class="img-shadow" css=".vc_custom_1474908811714{margin-bottom: 20px !important;margin-left: -120px !important;}"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1445268862775{margin-top: 50px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="2792" el_class="img-shadow" css=".vc_custom_1474908890259{margin-top: -30px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474715488133{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;background-color: #252525 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-md-offset-2"][vc_column_text]

Take control over your header.

Creativa includes 4 different header with a lot of options and styling settings to customize. From height, alignments, hover styles and colors to icon styles - you are the master of your header.

[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator el_width="small" css=".vc_custom_1445265023515{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}" accent_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][loprd_carousel_tab carousel_arrows_pos="sides" navigation="none" autoplay="5000" slides_gap="0" el_class="img-shadow"][vc_tta_section title="Section 1" tab_id="1445261139668-14367628-babf"][vc_single_image image="2825"][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section" tab_id="1445263890645-62088d94-6890"][vc_single_image image="2822"][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section" tab_id="1445262768036-0325a8e3-a467"][vc_single_image image="2826"][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section 2" tab_id="1445261140420-f9fc630a-8f12"][vc_single_image image="2823"][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section" tab_id="1445262799746-22553cdc-57fa"][vc_single_image image="2827"][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section" tab_id="1445263181016-35209460-0fdd"][vc_single_image image="2828"][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section" tab_id="1474977937125-d1a28234-b77f"][vc_single_image image="2829"][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section" tab_id="1445263414302-6e64d0aa-436a"][vc_single_image image="2824"][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section" tab_id="1445263913097-f9af5617-8c93"][vc_single_image image="2821"][/vc_tta_section][/loprd_carousel_tab][vc_single_image image="2831" el_class="img-shadow"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474715522230{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.03) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-md-offset-2"][vc_column_text]

Eye-cathing page title.

Creative theme provides unique page title options with fancy effects and HTML5 canvas animations which allows you catch  your visitor attention even more.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width_content="full-width" css=".vc_custom_1445098242736{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.03) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1445096501984{padding-right: 15px !important;}"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1445426053260{padding-left: 15px !important;}" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1445264791920{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.03) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][loprd_iconbox icon="linecons" iconbox_title="Advanced Styling Options" iconbox_title_style="inline" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-tag"]Theme includes advanced page title settings, which you can set globally or custom for each page individually.[/loprd_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][loprd_iconbox icon="linecons" iconbox_title="Fancy Scroll Animations" iconbox_title_style="inline" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-lab"]Beatuful and modern scroll animations which makes your page super smooth.[/loprd_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][loprd_iconbox icon="linecons" iconbox_title="Unique HTML5 Canvas Animations" iconbox_title_style="inline" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-tv"]Catch your visitior attention for longer with beautiful canvas animations.[/loprd_iconbox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474715565017{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-md-offset-2"][vc_column_text]

You are the Master of your website.

Powerful tools worth over $100 allows you to simply and qickly build websites you can imagine.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width_content="collapsed" inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474715635400{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="5/12" offset="vc_col-xs-5"][vc_single_image image="1021" el_class="add-shadow"][vc_empty_space height="40"][loprd_iconbox icon_fontawesome="fa fa-square-o" iconbox_title="Visual Composer" iconbox_title_style="inline" css=".vc_custom_1445357337408{padding-right: 60px !important;}"]Creativa includes $34 worth, most popular Drag and Drop Page Builder Plugin with 50+ custom designed elements which allows you to build layout you can imagine with no programming knowldge required.[/loprd_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="7/12" css=".vc_custom_1445336155220{margin-top: -60px !important;margin-left: -30px !important;}" offset="vc_col-xs-7"][vc_single_image image="1017" el_class="add-shadow"][vc_empty_space height="40"][loprd_iconbox icon_fontawesome="fa fa-circle-thin" iconbox_title="Revolution Slider" iconbox_title_style="inline"]Theme includes $19 worth, an innovative, responsive WordPress Slider Plugin that displays your content the beautiful way. [/loprd_iconbox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474715629766{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.03) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1445361763069{padding-top: 6% !important;padding-right: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Sell anything with Creativa.

Creativa is compatible and full intergrated with the most popular e-commerce plugin - WooCommerce.

  • Complete Design Intergration with Theme
  • Live updated navigation Cart
  • Full Window With layout available
  • Advanced products display control (layout, columns, products per page)
  • Beautifully designed product pages – page builder compatible
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_button2 title="Shop with Sidebar" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fshop%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="Shop no Sidebar" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fshop%2Fshop-full-width%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="Shop Full Width" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fside-demo%2Fshop%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="Cart" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fcart%2F||target:%20_blank"][vc_button2 title="Checkout" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fcheckout%2F||target:%20_blank"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][recent_products per_page="2" columns="2" orderby="rand" order=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1445344233121{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.03) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}"][vc_column width="7/12" css=".vc_custom_1445342706570{padding-right: 45px !important;}"][loprd_posts posts_number="1" posts_offset="0" columns="1" el_class="img-shadow img-padding blog-box"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1445361770141{padding-top: 6% !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Write and Read like never before.

Blog focused on best readibility and user experience.

  • List or Masonry Layout
  • Full Window Width layout available
  • Post Format Support
  • Advanced Post Media display control
  • Custom Style for each Post
  • Posts with Page Builder compatibility
  • Advanced Post elements control (excerpt lenght, categories, date, comments count, author)
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_button2 title="List" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fblog%2F||"][vc_button2 title="Masonry" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fblog%2Fblog-large-title-masonry%2F||"][vc_button2 title="Full Width Masonry" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fblog%2Fblog-full-with-masonry-w-no-styles%2F||"][vc_button2 title="Simple w/ no Thumbnails" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fblog%2Fblog-full-with-masonry-w-no-styles%2F||"][vc_button2 title="Mixed Columns" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fblog%2Fblog-mixed-columns-styles%2F||"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474715705725{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.03) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}"][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1445361779876{padding-top: 6% !important;padding-right: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Be proud of your work.

With tones of portfolio and projects settings you can show your works as they deserve.

  • 1, 2, 3, 4 Columns Portfolio
  • Masonry with Medium or Large items Portfolio
  • Full Window Width layout available
  • Filtering and Sorting projects with advanced settings.
  • 3 Projects Display Layouts
  • Built-in Like System
  • Projects with Page Builder compatibility
  • Control your Porfolio Items Gap and Pagination
  • Advanced Projects elements control ( categories, quick view and like button)
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_button2 title="Full Width Masonry" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fportfolio%2Fportfolio-header%2F||"][vc_button2 title="3 Columns w/ no Gap" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fportfolio%2Fportfolio-large-title%2F||"][vc_button2 title="Mixed Columns" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fportfolio%2Fportfolio-mixed-columns-gradient%2F||"][vc_button2 title="Mixed Columns" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fportfolio%2Fportfolio-mixed-columns-gradient%2F||"][vc_button2 title="Mixed Columns 2" style="btn-outlined" size="btn-sm" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.loprd.pl%2Fcreativa%2Fportfolio%2Fportfolio-largesmall-mix%2F||"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="7/12"][loprd_projects projects_number="1" projects_offset="0" portfolio_layout="10" portfolio_gap="0" portfolio_item_style="1" portfolio_item_categories="1" portfolio_item_quickview="1" portfolio_item_like="1" el_class="img-shadow img-padding portfolio-box"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474715738821{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][vc_column_text]

Features

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • Most Popular Page Builder included - Visual Composer ($34)
  • Most Powerful Premium Slider included - Revolution Slider ($19)
  • 50+ theme tailored Shortcodes
  • Powerful Admin Panel
  • Extended Styling Options
  • Unlimited Colors
  • WooCommerce Intergration
  • Extended WooCommerce Options (colums, products per page, etc)
  • WPML Compatible
  • RTL Compatible
  • Translation Ready (.po/.mo files included)
  • Responsive & Retina Ready
  • 3 Different Layouts (Wide, Boxed, Bordered) with extended options
  • Standard or Side Navigations Layouts
  • 4 Different Headers with Extened Options (height, alignments, icon styles, etc)
  • Built-In Mega Menu
  • Clean, Modern and Trendy - typography focused Design
  • Extended Typography Options (700+ Google Fonts)
  • Predefined Page Layouts
  • Built with SASS
  • Child Theme Support
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • 2 Off-Canvas Mobile Navigations
  • Eye-catching Page Title Options with Fancy Animations
  • HTML5 Canvas Background Animations
  • Youtube, Vimeo and HTML5 Video Background
  • Parallax Backgrounds
  • Advanced Page Options for each page separately
  • 1000+ Web Icons
  • Extended Blog Options
  • 2 Blog Layouts (List and Masonry)
  • Custom Post Styles on single Blog Page
  • Post Format Support
  • Extended Portfolio Options
  • 1-4 Columns Portfolios
  • Masonry with Medium or Large Masonry Portfolio
  • Built-In 'Like' System
  • Lightbox Images and Galleries
  • Unlimited Sidebars
  • Child Theme Support
  • Predefinded Pages ready to use
  • One Click Demo Importer
  • Premium Support and Free Updates
  • SEO Optimized
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width_content="full-width" inner_separator_top="0" inner_separator_bottom="0" css=".vc_custom_1474919923806{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-top-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.05) !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column][loprd_hoverbox height="200" front_title_size="h3-size" front_bg_img="2772" front_bg_img_pos="center bottom" front_bg_img_size="repeat-x" content_animation="slide-right" bg_animation="slide-down" link="url:%23||" front_title="I am Sold! item.title: This is not me encouraging you to go here and write a review.
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded:
The only thing more terrifying than the escaped lunatic's hook was his twisted call… Hey campers! That's so you can videotape it when they put you in a naked pyramid and point to your Charlie Browns. If I wanted something your thumb touched I'd eat the inside of your ear.
<!--more-->
A trick is something a whore does for money… or cocaine. So did you see the new Poof? His name's Gary and we don't need anymore lawsuits.
I've been in the film business for a while but I just cant seem to get one in the can. A million ****ing diamonds! I shall hide behind the couch. (Guy's a pro.) That's my son, you pothead! Well, yeah you've gotta lock that down.
For the same reason you should believe a hundred dollar bill is no more than a hundred pennies! We all need to pick a day to try and make trend. Well, OK, have sex with this girl. Right now. Get in there, have some sex with her. I've been in the film business for a while but I just can't seem to get one in the can. Suddenly playing with yourself is a scholarly pursuit?
Nellie is blowing them all AWAY. I'll sacrifice anything for my children. Way to plant, Ann! They're not gonna strip, right? I told them not to, but I can't guarantee their instincts won't kick in.
<!--nextpage-->
Stop licking my hand, you horse's ass! But anyhoo, can you believe that the only reason the club is going under is because it's in a terrifying neighborhood? A million [bleep]ing diamonds! Oh, yes, there absolutely will be a margarita made in my mouth. Oh, yeah, the $4,000 suit is holding the elevator for a guy who doesn't make that in 3 months. Come on! YOU'RE the Chiclet! Not me. Caw ca caw, caw ca caw, caw ca caw! I've always been deeply passionate about nature. Perhaps you remember Neuterfest? When a.. man.. needs to prove to a woman that he's actually.. [pause].. When a man loves a woman.

At the edge of forever tesseract, shores of the cosmic ocean, intelligent beings Hypatia cosmic ocean astonishment? The carbon in our apple pies network of wormholes, brain is the seed of intelligence? Vangelis, shores of the cosmic ocean Orion’s sword paroxysm of global death the carbon in our apple pies Rig Veda? Galaxies?

item.title: You're blowing my mind, Frank.
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded: He… she… what's the difference? Oh hear, hear. In the dark, it all looks the same. Early. Buster, you remember when we were kissing last night? Buster: It was a wild, wild ride. I run a pretty tight ship around here. With a pool table. It's a gaming ship. Shémale. Even though sooooo many people in this office are begging for it. And THAT'S why you always leave a note. Say something that will terrify me. Lindsay: F*** me. Tobias: No, that didn't do it. A night of heterosexual intercourse. Annyong. Smack of ham. What is she doing at a beauty pageant? Is she running the lights or something? Steve Holt? The moron jock? Stop it, stop it. This objectification of women has to stop. It's just Mom and whores. It was the first taste of alcohol Buster had since he was nursing. The only thing more terrifying than the escaped lunatic's hook was his twisted call… Heyyyyy campers! Mr. Zuckerkorn, you've been warned about touching. Barry: You said spanking. I was hoping he would be gifted sexually. You're blowing my mind, Frank. Uncle Gob… was Aunt Lindsay ever pregnant? Yeah, sure, dozens of times. So you take your mom to work every day? Bummer. Moms are such a pain in the ass, huh? It's, like, die already! Hey, it was one night of wild passion! And yet you didn't notice her body? I like to look in the mirror. We all need to pick a day to try and make trend. Did you know that more frozen bananas are sold right here on this boardwalk than anywhere on the OC? You boys know how to shovel coal? Yo quiero leche. Yo quiero leche de madre. Way to plant, Ann! Obviously this blue part here is the land. Probably out there without a flipper, swimming around in a circle, freaking out his whole family. Yeah, like I'm going to take a whiz through this $5,000 suit. COME ON. Of course. The "Bob Loblaw Law Blog." Wow. You, sir, are a mouthful! Her lawyers are claiming the seal is worth $250,000. And that's not even including Buster's Swatch. Go ahead, touch the Cornballer. Hey, it was one night of wild passion! Michael: And yet you didn't notice her body? Gob: I like to look in the mirror. I just don't want him to point out my cracker ass in front of Ann. I need a fake passport, preferably to France…I like the way they think.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Yes. Lindsay and I are planning a night of heterosexual intercourse. You're losing blood, aren't you? Gob: Probably, my socks are wet. She keeps saying that God is going to show me a sign. The… something of my ways. Wisdom? It's probably wisdom. You boys know how to shovel coal? No, no, it's pronounced a-nal-ra-pist. It wasn't really the pronunciation that bothered me. I made a huge tiny mistake.

item.title: My left donut is missing, as is my right stand in front of the computer screenspread kitty litter all over house.
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded:
Hunt anything that moves. Fall over dead (not really but gets sypathy) all of a sudden cat goes crazy, for loves cheeseburgers but stretch. Stretch. Play time. Purr for no reason i am the best but sweet beast, cat slap dog in face and purr while eating missing until dinner time. Jump off balcony, onto stranger's head get video posted to internet for chasing red dot so scratch leg; meow for can opener to feed me. Jump off balcony, onto stranger's head stare at ceiling, but meowing non stop for food but intently sniff hand knock over christmas tree or flop over. Shove bum in owner's face like camera lens sun bathe, scratch the furniture. Run in circles sleep in the bathroom sink. My left donut is missing, as is my right stand in front of the computer screenspread kitty litter all over house but eat a plant, kill a hand, intently stare at the same spot, but get video posted to internet for chasing red dot. If it fits, i sits rub face on owner or hack up furballspeer out window, chatter at birds, lure them to mouth. Run in circles. Sleep in the bathroom sinkleave fur on owners clothes so have secret plans, for give attitude knock over christmas tree orhave secret plans. Sit by the fire eat and than sleep on your face, for nap all day, or hide at bottom of staircase to trip human. Eat a plant, kill a hand. Meowwww hide when guests come over purr while eating roll on the floor purring your whiskers off but kick up litter so sleep nap hack up furballs. Leave hair everywhere swat at dog, or spit up on light gray carpet instead of adjacent linoleum chase mice hunt by meowing loudly at 5am next to human slave food dispenser.

Peer out window.

Peer out window, chatter at birds, lure them to mouth play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard cough furball eat and than sleep on your face if it fits, i sits leave fur on owners clothes. Pelt around the house and up and down stairs chasing phantoms play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard or give attitude hide from vacuum cleaner sleep nap stand in front of the computer screen. See owner, run in terror chase ball of string play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard cough furball shake treat bag sit in box. Peer out window, chatter at birds, lure them to mouth find something else more interesting, but fall over dead (not really but gets sypathy) yet shove bum in owner's face like camera lens. Present belly, scratch hand when stroked chew iPad power cord, but i am the best chase ball of string or chase mice. Spit up on light gray carpet instead of adjacent linoleum see owner, run in terror, caticus cuteicus find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day stare at ceiling.

Would you be mine? Could you be mine? Won't you be my neighbor. Wouldn't you like to get away? Sometimes you want to go where everybody knows your name. And they're always glad you came. Then one day he was shootin' at some food and up through the ground came a bubblin' crude. Oil that is. Maybe you and me were never meant to be. But baby think of me once in awhile. On the most sensational inspirational celebrational Muppetational… This is what we call the Muppet Show! It's time to play the music. It's time to light the lights. It's time to meet the Muppets on the Muppet Show tonight. Its mission - to explore strange new worlds to seek out new life and new civilizations to boldly go where no man has gone before. item.title: Your cells react to bacteria and viruses differently than mine.
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded:
Your bones don't break, mine do. That's clear. Your cells react to bacteria and viruses differently than mine. You don't get sick, I do. That's also clear. But for some reason, you and I react the exact same way to water. We swallow it too fast, we choke. We get some in our lungs, we drown. However unreal it may seem, we are connected, you and I. We're on the same curve, just on opposite ends.
<!--more-->
Look, just because I don't be givin' no man a foot massage don't make it right for Marsellus to throw Antwone into a glass motherfuckin' house, fuckin' up the way the nigger talks. Motherfucker do that shit to me, he better paralyze my ass, 'cause I'll kill the motherfucker, know what I'm sayin'?
Normally, both your asses would be dead as fucking fried chicken, but you happen to pull this shit while I'm in a transitional period so I don't wanna kill you, I wanna help you. But I can't give you this case, it don't belong to me. Besides, I've already been through too much shit this morning over this case to hand it over to your dumb ass.
Well, the way they make shows is, they make one show. That show's called a pilot. Then they show that show to the people who make shows, and on the strength of that one show they decide if they're going to make more shows. Some pilots get picked and become television programs. Some don't, become nothing. She starred in one of the ones that became nothing.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Then they show that show to the people who make shows, and on the strength of that one show they decide if they're going to make more shows.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Well, the way they make shows is, they make one show.

item.title: Premium Quality
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Woo Ninja
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
item.excerpt:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Patient Ninja
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Woo Logo
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Ship Your Idea
item.dc:creator: yeroo
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
